datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro: The protection of your personal data is important to us. This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data by our QuickPoll application.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller is Skeptic Systems. For questions about data protection, you can contact us via email.

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.content: QuickPoll processes data exclusively for conducting surveys and quizzes. No personal data is stored unless you explicitly provide it.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use technically necessary cookies for the functionality of the application. These cannot be disabled.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to information, correction, deletion and objection regarding your personal data.
